David Saff wrote:
> 
> 
> Dirk,
> 
> I'm sorry not to have responded sooner. Are you sure this is a bug?
> The method is taking in the filename of a class, not a method.

It might be a bug: what if the test class filename starts with "Test"? 
Should that be a test class or not?

> duit1998 wrote:
>  > The method SimpleTestCollector.isTestClass(String classFileName) is
>  > implemented faulty:
>  >
>  > This is the implementation of junit 3.8.1:
>  > protected boolean isTestClass(String classFileName) {
>  > return
>  > classFileName.endsWith(".class") &&
>  > classFileName.indexOf('$') < 0 &&
>  > classFileName.indexOf("Test") > 0;
>  > }
